desc: Multiplies Summoner EXP, weapon EXP, and SP by 2 whenever a Quest is cleared for 30min
lore: Extremely precious water sold at the Akras Summoners' Hall. This holy water holds mysterious spirits, and is said to grant Summoners far more experience than usual when consumed. Although the source of this holy water is kept a close secret, rumors hold that one of the Summoners of Old visits other worlds to procure it and thus promote development among younger Summoners.
name: Experience Tonic
